mapper.insert: insert into commboard (boNum,boContent, boTitle, boURL, memNum, boUpdateDate, boRegDate, boLikes, boViews) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boContent}, #{boTitle}, #{boURL}, #{memNum}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),0,0)
mapper.update: update commboard set boContent=#{boContent}, boTitle=#{boTitle}, boURL=#{boURL}, memNum=#{memNum} boUpdateDate=sysdate where boNum=#{boNum}
